text.div:
LocationPartOfSearchParameter

Parameter partOf:reference

Searches based on the partof field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?partof={reference}

ResourceLocation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesLocation
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: LocationPartOfSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the partof field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?partof={reference}
